p: The surface-sterilized seeds were plated on agar plates of MS medium containing 1% sucrose and incubated in darkness for 3 days at 4 °C. The plates were then placed vertically in a growth chamber set to 22 °C under a 16-h-light (120 μEm −2 s −1)/8-h-dark photoperiod for 4 days. Then, the germination rate and seedling length were measured.
